text.jpText:
ついにやってきた『菊花賞』。
トウカイテイオーとの直接対決を前に、
ナイスネイチャはいつになく緊張していた。
text.enText:
The "Kikka-sho" has finally arrived. Before 
the direct confrontation with Tokai Teio Nice 
Nature was more nervous than ever.

text.jpText:
だがレース開始直前……ナイスネイチャは、
トウカイテイオーがケガをして、
『菊花賞』の出走を辞退したことを知る。
text.enText:
However, just before the race starts…… Nice 
Nature learns that Tokai Teio has been 
injured and has withdrawn from the 
"Kikka-sho". However, just before the start 
of the race, Nice Nature learns that Tokai 
Teio has been injured and has withdrawn from 
the "Kikka-sho".

text.jpText:
彼女を追って『菊花賞』に出走した
ナイスネイチャは突然目標を失って、
気持ちの整理がつかずに取り乱してしまう。
text.enText:
Nice Nature, who ran in the "Kikka-sho" 
after her, suddenly loses her target. 
She is distraught because she can't 
get her mind in order.

text.jpText:
トレーナーからかけられた言葉でなんとか
落ち着きを取り戻したナイスネイチャは
勝負の舞台へ踏み出していった。
text.enText:
After regaining her composure with a few 
words from her trainer, Nice Nature stepped 
out onto the playing field. Nice Nature 
stepped out onto the stage to compete.
